# R Package *sifr*

Spatial Interpolation Functions in R

## Author

Zehui Yin, [zehuiyin@gmail.com](mailto:zehuiyin@gmail.com)

# Installation

You can install `sifr` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
if(!require(devtools)){
    install.packages("devtools")
    library(devtools)
}

devtools::install_github("zehuiyin/sifr")
```

# Example Usage

You can find an example regression analysis using this package here: [Vignette](https://zehuiyin.github.io/sifr.html).
